article.description: Monmouth closes on 17-1 run to beat Fordham 87-78
article.headline: Monmouth closes on 17-1 run to beat Fordham 87-78
article.linkText: Monmouth closes on 17-1 run to beat Fordham 87-78
article.story: WEST LONG BRANCH, N.J. -- Andrew Nicholas scored 30 points as Monmouth used a late run to beat Fordham 87-78 on Saturday. Monmouth (6-6) trailed 77-70 with 3-1/2 minutes remaining but scored 10 straight points and finished the game on a 17-1 run. Nicholas had eight points during that stretch while finishing 10 of 21 from the field and 6 of 13 from beyond the arc. Max DiLeo added 18 points and Deon Jones had 13 for Monmouth. Monmouth led 26-17 in the first half but Fordham (6-4) scored 14 straight points to take the lead. Fordham led by as many as 13 in the second half. Jon Severe had 32 points and was 8-of-13 on 3-pointers for Fordham. Monmouth has now won five of its past seven games after starting the season 1-4.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
